title: sylas busted
body:
*****lands full combo from kat onto sylas*****
Sylas: *****only loses 1/5 hp because of heals and shield*****

PS. thanks for buffing his heals early game (sarcasm).

replies.body: Sylas is weak because he needs a team to drag him into a win. He's a legit b tier champ.
Yeah idk why they dont nerf his w and maybe give more attention to his Q or something
